title: Seduce Me!
description: The art of seduction is an extremely powerful one when used by someone who understands it. A single kiss can leave someone desperate for more, just like the softest touch can make someone yours forever. The question is, who's seducing who?Emlia, a beautiful yet unaware student finds herself in the midst of more than a love triangle! When events, as well as men from outside of school, become entangled within her education, she struggles to choose where her heart truly lies.She captures the eye of her new drama teacher and the sexual tension between them fails to subside. Though the both of them know that this type of prescriptive relationship is forbidden, they can't help but consider the possibilities such a liason would bring.Throw in some other obstacles such as a psycho ex boyfriend, a drug dealing crush and an admirer in the form of a girl, Emlia really is drowning in the deep end - but who does she truly love and will the art of seduction alter this?
author: Jessica Lambert
